metadata.title: New Balance Women's Beaya V1 Slip-On Running Shoe
features: DynaSoft midsole couples ultra-responsive performance with plush comfort
Rubber outsole pods designed to stand up to daily wear-and-tear
Slip-on construction for easy, on-the-go wear
6 mm drop; due to variances created during the development and manufacturing processes, all references to 6 mm drop are approximate
description: The New Balance Beaya Slip On is a stylish option for women on the go. A DynaSoft midsole and lightweight rubber pod outsole deliver supportive comfort with reliable traction. The stylish textile upper pops with graphic print details. Elastic bands make it easy to slip in and out of these women's athletic shoes without any fussy closures or laces to slow you down.

title: New Balance Women's Beaya V1 Running Shoe Closer Look
